MAIN_MESSAGE: There is power cut in the DG11, DG12 and DG16 postcode areas of Lockerbie, Annan and Gretna. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:02pm. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to repair faulty over head line equipment affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:33 AM on Tuesday, 12 January 2021.
